articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting Marking 65th Birthday of Revolutionary Schools
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting Marking 65th Birthday of Revolutionary Schools
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the meeting for celebrating the 65th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School.
					 He warmly congratulated the teachers, students and graduates of the schools on their 65th anniversary.
					
					 He highly praised the schools for having brought up many people playing the core and pivotal role in the struggle for defending the country and achieving its prosperity over the past 65 years under the leadership and care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He warmly encouraged the graduates from the schools who grew up nurturing the soul of Mangyongdae, while drinking and breathing the water and air of Mangyongdae, to successfully discharge their mission and duty as the pillars and core backbone of the Songun revolution as befitting the sons and daughters of the WPK. 
					
					 He expressed hope and conviction that the teachers, students and graduates of the schools would always fulfill their key role in the effort for inheriting and accomplishing generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He warmly acknowledged the enthusiastically cheering participants.
					
					 Present there were leading officials of the party, state and army who are graduates from Mangyongdae Revolutionary School including Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, O Kuk Ryol, Thae Jong Su and Ri Phyong Sam, and Principals of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School O Ryong Thaek and Ju Sun Ok.
					
					 Veteran anti-Japanese fighters including Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui and Kim Chol Man took part.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Project for Face-lifting River Pothong
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Project for Face-lifting River Pothong
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made field survey of the project for face-lifting the River Pothong here.
					 Going round various work sites, he learned in detail about dredging and transport of mud.
					
					 He encouraged soldiers displaying the inexhaustible militancy of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu in the huge project for face-lifting the Pothong River in the same spirit as displayed when they finished the project for face-lifting the River Hapjang in a brief span of time in hearty response to the order of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He underlined the need to thoroughly purify sewage and take good care of promenade and its vicinity as the River Pothong is turning into a river for the people and a river of prosperity thanks to the devoted efforts of the service personnel.
					
					 Discussions were made on the spot to ensure that the Cabinet and relevant units step up the work to organize transport, keep vehicles in full-capacity operation and carry away mud in a short span of time.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian Political Party Leader
						
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting on Oct. 9 from Prakash Karat, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist).
					 In the message the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) sent a warm solute to Kim Jong Un, all the members of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK on the 67th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK was born amid the revolutionary struggle of the Korean people for creating new life 67 years ago under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the message said, adding it was a historic event. 
					
					 The message continued: Its founding brought about a radical turn in the Korean people's efforts to carve out their destiny. The 67 years covered by the WPK are a history of the revolutionary struggle in which great achievements have been made by the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Communist Party of India (Marxist) is watching the developments in the DPRK and the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is confident that the sinister plots of the U.S. imperialists and their puppet forces against the DPRK will fail and certainly be frustrated by its people.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the WPK would further consolidate the gains of socialism in the DPRK and reunify Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Communist Party of India (Marxist) wished Kim Jong Un, the WPK and all the Korean people greater successes in the future on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the WPK, the message added.

articles.title: Moranbong Band Gives Performance before Full House
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Gives Performance before Full House 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band gave a performance "Song in Praise of Guiding Party" before full house to celebrate the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among the audience were youth, students, teachers, researchers, working people in Pyongyang, officials, creators, artistes and pressmen in the fields of literature and arts and the press and officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as light music and song "It Is October", light music for cello "I Know You Only," string quartet "Lights from the Party Central Committee". 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed by achieving the historic cause of founding the revolutionary party and successfully leading the WPK and the Korean revolution.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave a performance "Fly High, Our Party Flag" at the Mansudae Art Theatre here Sunday to celebrate the October jubilee.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party, state and army and officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 The performance began with male chorus "The Leader and the General Are Together". Put on the stage were female quartet and male chorus "It is October", male chorus "Fly High, Our Party Flag", mixed duet "You Are Mother" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The numbers singing high praises of the greatness of the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the invincible party and the mother party, deeply impressed the audience.
					
					 Also put on the stage were songs singing of the era of Kim Jong Un advancing to realize the noble ideal of the people.
					
					 The numbers represented the people's happiness thanks to the loving care of the mother party and the revolutionary spirit of all service personnel and people dynamically advancing towards the eminence of prosperity, loudly shouting hurrah for the Workers' Party. They instilled new confidence and courage into the audience 
					
					 The performance proved the truth that the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to win as there are the wise leadership of the WPK and the single-minded unity of all personnel and people around the party.

articles.title: DPRK Soccer Team Finishes Second at 2012 U-17 Women World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Soccer Team Finishes Second at 2012 U-17 Women World Cup 
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Soccer Team played finals with its French rival on Saturday at the 2012 U-17 Women World Cup. A seesaw match was held between the DPRK team and its French rival. The first and second halves of the match ended in a draw of 1:1. In the eleven m penalty kick the former was beaten by the latter 6:7. 
					 The DPRK team placed second at the World Cup.

articles.title: U.S. Modernization of Nuclear Forces under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Modernization of Nuclear Forces under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- It was reported by the Washington Post recently that expenditure for the modernization of nuclear forces is drastically increasing in the U.S. as its plan is delayed.
					 According to the paper, the improvement of B-61 nuclear bombs will require 10 billion dollars in five years to come, the building of 12 new type nuclear-powered submarines for the purpose of bolstering nuclear delivery means require 110 billions dollars and the procurement of each nuclear capable F-35 would cost 162 million dollars.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article urges the U.S. to stop at once a mockery of the international community with a cheap advertisement of disarmament and the modernization of nuclear forces against peace.
					
					 The U.S. has pushed ahead with the modernization of nuclear forces under the signboard of disarmament, the article says, adding:
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to reduce the number of some aging nuclear weapons and develop and update new type nuclear weapons and manufacture ultramodern weapons equivalent to nukes in striking and destructive power.
					
					 It spent more than 10 billion dollars for modernizing nuclear weapons or improving them or extending their use in 2009 only.
					
					 It is mulling investing huge additional funds in the near future.
					
					 It is also putting spurs to the development of nuclear delivery means.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. military authorities disclosed that huge funds would be spent for developing new type long-distance nuclear capable bombers while announcing a proposal for defence budget.
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating deploying hypersonic bombs in 2015. When they are deployed, it will be capable of mounting surprise attacks on any country incurring its displeasure.
					
					 The U.S. modernization of nuclear forces is dangerous as it may trigger a new arms race and they can be used as conventional weapons at any time.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal who disturbs the global peace and security.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps S. Korean Regime's Frantic Racket for Invading DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps S. Korean Regime's Frantic Racket for Invading DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- At a "cabinet meeting" traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea instructed his minions to make sure that missiles were deployed to be ready to go into action at an early date. Jong Sung Jo, "chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff", and other warmongers are openly floating the story about "four-phase three dimensional strike", blustering that "south Korea is working out a proposal for mounting a preemptive attack if it detects a sign of the north's imminent use of nukes".
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is kicking off a hysteric racket, blinded with its ambition for invading the DPRK in the wake of its announcement of the "missile guidance agreement".
					
					 There looms as a reality the outbreak of a new war, a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, the one of the biggest hotspots in the world.
					
					 The puppet group's frantic moves for igniting a war against the DPRK are a product of its conspiracy with the U.S. The U.S. is the real ruler of south Korea and the Lee group is no more than a puppet executing the U.S. colonial rule. It is under the U.S. backing that the Lee group is getting so crazy in its moves to ignite the war.
					
					 The present U.S. rulers said more than once that it has no hostile intent on the DPRK. But this is no more than a deceptive intrigue to mislead public opinion at home and abroad. It has been disclosed recently that the U.S. is working out together with the group "a joint plan for coping with a local war". The U.S. is becoming all the more undisguised in its moves to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster war deterrent for self-defence to cope with the prevailing situation. As clarified in a statement of a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission, all service personnel and people of the DPRK will wipe out all the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and the Lee group of traitors, their stooges, to the last man and conclude a great war for national reunification with a final victory.

articles.title: Bulletin of Overseas Koreans' Organization Issued
articles.content:
Bulletin of Overseas Koreans' Organization Issued 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans issued the September issue of its bulletin "Thongil".
					 The bulletin carried a photo of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un paying high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the 64th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 In the column devoted to the 64th birthday of the DPRK it carried articles titled "High Stage of Building Thriving Nation" and "Thriving State Based on Independence".
					
					 It conveyed accounts of the national meeting for celebrating the 64th birthday of the DPRK, an opening ceremony of the Pyongyang Folk Park, etc. 
					
					 An article titled "Tender-hearted Leader" written by Korean in the U.S. Kim Suk in praise of Kim Jong Un was carried in the bulletin.
					
					 It also edited an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Suk Always Remembered by the World People" accompanied by her photo on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the passing of the anti-Japanese war hero. 
					
					 In the column devoted to the situation on the Korean Peninsula the bulletin carried the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry to the question put by KCNA over the unreasonable accusations made by the U.S. and IAEA against the DPRK's building of a light water reactor. 
					
					 It also carried a press release released by the Southwest Front Command of the Korean People's Army and a statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea condemning the south Korean puppets' acts of escalating the tension to an extreme pitch in the five islands in the West Sea of Korea and waters around them.
					
					 The bulletin conveyed cultural news.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party" was carried by the 202nd issue of the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare on Monday.
					 The work, published on January 3, 1992, clarifies that a historical lesson drawn from socialist construction is that it is necessary to steadily strengthen the driving force for revolution with faith in socialism and a correct guiding idea, adhere to the principle of socialism and consolidate the comradely unity and cooperation based on independence.
					
					 The work clarifies the idea that it is the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea for building socialism to strengthen the people's power and increase its function and role and thoroughly carry out the three revolutions -- ideological, technical and cultural. The work also explains the validity of the idea.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Diverse events were held abroad on Oct. 4 and 5 to mark the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. They included seminars in Bulgaria and Mali and a seminar, photo exhibition and film show in Bangladesh. 
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos of feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in party building.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos of the history of the WPK.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said the WPK which was founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il organizes and guides all the victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Malian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea noted the WPK could advance straight along the road of socialism thanks to Kim Jong Il's feats. 
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy pointed out the WPK would demonstrate its dignity as a powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution and adorn its ever-victorious history in the future, too, as it has the dear respected Kim Jong Un as its first secretary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Achievements Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Achievements Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The ideological and theoretical achievements of leader Kim Jong Il were reported by foreign papers.
					 The October 1-7 issue of the Lao paper Heng Ngan carried an article "Legacy Bequeathed by Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 He glorified the Juche idea and the Songun idea as an eternal guiding idea for Korea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					 He also developed the President's idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs as required by the era and set it forth as an invincible treasured sword for accomplishing the cause of independence.
					
					 This ideological and theoretical wealth constitutes the most valuable legacy bequeathed by him to the Korean people and the progressive mankind.
					
					 The Myanmar paper Live News on Oct. 6 devoted its one whole page to articles entitled "The Juche Idea and Kim Jong Il" and "Declaration of History." 
					
					 The paper lauded the ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il, noting that the Juche idea, recognized by the international community as a guiding ideology for the cause of independence would be unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Il Sung, its founder, and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported by Belarusian Political Personage
articles.content:
Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported by Belarusian Political Personage
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Shkolinikov, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, issued a statement on Oct. 8 to mark the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration,
					 The statement said:
					
					 The peaceful reunification of Korea is the desire of not only the Korean people but the world progressives.
					
					 Korea's peaceful reunification can be achieved only when the U.S. interference is terminated and the independence of the Korean nation is realized.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the orientation and ways for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 All the Korean people can lead an independent life in peace only when Korea is reunified on the basis of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S. has hamstrung the efforts of the Korean people for reunification, opposed to the conclusion of a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 Under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un the Korean people are dynamically marching towards the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea as intended by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The statement expressed conviction that the heroic Korean people will accomplish the cause of reunification without fail despite all difficulties.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Democratic Congo and Nepal
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Democratic Congo and Nepal 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Personages of a political party of Democratic Congo and a Nepali social organization released statements on Oct. 3 and 5 on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, said that the WPK is guided by the Juche idea in its activities, the idea that the master of the revolution and construction is the popular masses and they are capable of promoting revolution and construction.
					
					 He said that the successes achieved by the Korean people under the leadership of the WPK proved the truth and validity of the Juche idea.
					
					 He noted that leader Kim Jong Il authored many works, proving the truth of the revolutionary idea and the scientific theory on socialism of President Kim Il Sung, clarifying the fundamentals for building a revolutionary party and principles governing party activities.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il's works serve as an encyclopedia on socialism.
					
					 Manik lal Shrestha, chairman of the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, said that it is the truth of history that victory of the cause of revolution can be won only under the leadership of a revolutionary party.
					
					 He noted that the WPK has wisely led the Korean people only along the road of victory in every period and at every stage of revolution and construction.
					
					 The WPK will further develop into the Juche-type revolutionary party conducting all activities independently and creatively in the interests of the people and in conformity with the specific conditions of the country, guided by the Juche idea in the future, too, he said.

articles.title: DPRK Film Shows Held in Malaysia, Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK Film Shows Held in Malaysia, Indonesia 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in Malaysia and Indonesia between Oct. 4 and 8 on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 67th birthday.
					 Participants in the film shows watched "Pyongyang Today", "Party Founding Memorial Tower", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and other Korean films.
					
					 The general director of the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia noted that it is thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a power, a producer and launcher of satellites and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The manager of the UM Project Company of Malaysia noted that the world knows no such party as the WPK dynamically advancing without making any mistake in its line and going through any turns and twists with its clear-cut mission and objective, absolutely supported by the popular masses.
					
					 The manger of an Indonesian company said that the WPK and the Korean people would make greater successes in building a thriving nation as they are led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is steadfastly carrying forward the revolutionary idea of the Songun brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK's Efforts for Improving People's Living Standard
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK's Efforts for Improving People's Living Standard
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- People's Daily of China on Oct. 10 carried an article titled "DPRK Making Efforts to Improve the People's Living Standard" by its correspondents in Pyongyang.
					 The paper said that Oct. 10 this year marks the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The Korean people are bringing about a great surge in production and construction with redoubled efforts, single-mindedly united under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government have registered great successes by channeling their efforts into improving the living standard of the people, in particular.
					
					 The DPRK government is dynamically pushing ahead with construction projects to more satisfactorily solve the issue of housing in Pyongyang. 
					
					 One cannot but mention the apartment houses built in the area of Mansudae in the heart of Pyongyang.
					
					 Some time ago, eye-catching high-rise apartment houses were completed to become new architectural icons of Pyongyang. There sprang up around them public facilities such as the People's Theatre, schools and shops.
					
					 The government of the DPRK is building amusement facilities in a big way to enable its people fully enjoy a cultural life.
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Park was recently completed on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang.
					
					 A great number of Pyongyang citizens visit there to have good rest.
					
					 The DPRK government attaches great importance to the work to improve its people's living standard.
					
					 The Korean people still have not a few difficulties but they are working hard to build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Open in China
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Open in China 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- There took place in China on Oct. 9 and 10 DPRK book, photo and art exhibitions on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 67th birthday.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos showing the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display were their works, books and photos introducing the DPRK and fine art pieces associated with the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the events were officials of party and government organs and social bodies of Sichuan and Shandong provinces and masses and members of a delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A senior official of Sichuan Province said he was pleased to know about the successes made by the people of the DPRK in socialist construction and sincerely congratulated them on their successes.
					
					 The speaker expressed the will to develop the wide-range exchange and visits and boost the cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Jinan City Political Consultative Conference of Shandong Province said that the historic China visits paid by Kim Jong Il in May and August last year marked important occasions in boosting the Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The vice-chairman said that these exhibitions will offer an opportunity to know better about the personality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as great men and their undying feats and world-startling miracles and innovations being brought about by the DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
